      </a>

    <li role="presentation" class="typeahead-selected-end"></li>
  </ul>

  <ul role="presentation" class="typeahead-items typeahead-accounts js-typeahead-accounts">
    
    <li role="presentation" data-user-id="" data-user-screenname="" data-remote="true" data-score="" class="typeahead-item typeahead-account-item js-selectable">
      
      <a role="option" class="js-nav" data-query-source="typeahead_click" data-search-query="" data-ds="account">
        <img class="avatar size32" alt="">
        <span class="typeahead-user-item-info account-group">
          <span class="select-status deselect-user js-deselect-user Icon Icon--check"></span>
          <span class="select-status select-disabled Icon Icon--unfollow"></span>
          <span class="fullname"></span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified js-verified hidden"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span><span class="Icon Icon--protected js-protected hidden"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Protected Tweets</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak">&nbsp;</span><span class="username u-dir" dir="ltr">@<b></b></span>
        </span>
      </a>
    </li>
    <li role="presentation" class="typeahead-accounts-end"></li>
  </ul>
</div>

                                <li><a href="/projetos-sociais/anjos-da-madrugada.html">Ajuda a moradores de rua</a></li>
                                <li><a href="/projetos-sociais/projeto-raabe.html">Apoio a v&iacute;timas de viol&ecirc;ncia dom&eacute;stica</a></li>
                                <li><a href="/projetos-sociais/projeto-t-amar.html">Apoio a adolescentes gr&aacute;vidas e m&atilde;es solteiras</a></li>
                                <li><a href="/projetos-sociais/calebe.html">Incentivo e aux&iacute;lio a idosos</a></li>
                                <li><a href="/projetos-sociais/jovem-nota-10.html">Oportunidades no mercado de trabalho</a></li>
                                <li><a href="/projetos-sociais/dose-mais-forte.html">Aux&iacute;lio na recupera&ccedil;&atilde;o de dependentes qu&iacute;micos</a></li>
                                <li><a href="/projetos-sociais/uniforca.html">Apoio a equipes de resgates em ocorr&ecirc;ncias </a></li>
								<li><a href="/projetos-sociais/ler-e-escrever.html">Cursos de alfabetização e profissionalizantes</a></li>
                            </ul>
                        </div>
                        
                        <div class="col-5">

                function Gshow(id){
                  $(".box-galerias").hide();
                  $("#box-galerias"+id).show();
                  $(".menu-box-galeria").removeClass("active");
                  $("#menu-box-galeria"+id).addClass("active");
                }

								<div class="txtFto">
									<h3>Pernambuco</h3>
                                    <p>Ao todo, 23 mil pessoas participaram do evento em todo o estado  - <a href="/noticia/2017/03/15/caravana-do-resgate-reune-cerca-de-35-mil-pessoas-em-brasilia-e-pernambuco-39609.html" class="rel">Ver mat&#233;ria relacionada</a></p>

									<h3>Pernambuco</h3>
                                    <p>Videoconferência nas cidade de Caruaru, Arcoverde e Vitória  - <a href="/noticia/2017/03/15/caravana-do-resgate-reune-cerca-de-35-mil-pessoas-em-brasilia-e-pernambuco-39609.html" class="rel">Ver mat&#233;ria relacionada</a></p>

								<div class="txtFto">
									<h3>Pernambuco</h3>
                                    <p>O bispo alertou sobre a importância de todos não  desperdiçarem aquela oportunidade de se entregar a Deus   - <a href="/noticia/2017/03/15/caravana-do-resgate-reune-cerca-de-35-mil-pessoas-em-brasilia-e-pernambuco-39609.html" class="rel">Ver mat&#233;ria relacionada</a></p>

		          <li class="MAR-27">
		            <div>
		              <span class="dateName"><strong>MAR</strong>27</span>
		              <a href="/agenda/2017/03/27/congresso-para-o-sucesso-19506.html"><img src="//www.universal.org/uploads/2016/05/24/bp formigoni.196x122.jpg" alt="Congresso Para o Sucesso" title="Congresso Para o Sucesso" /></a>
		              <h3><a href="/agenda/2017/03/27/congresso-para-o-sucesso-19506.html">Congresso Para o Sucesso</a></h3>
		              <p><strong>local:</strong> Templo de Salomão<br>Aprenda a vencer as dificuldades financeiras</p>
		                		                <a class="bot readMore" href="#" >Leia mais</a>
		            </div>
		            <div class="info">
		              <a href="#" class="btnClose">x</a>
		              <img src="//www.universal.org/uploads/2016/05/24/bp formigoni.442x142.jpg" alt="Congresso Para o Sucesso" title="Congresso Para o Sucesso" />
		              <p><p style="text-align: justify;"><span>Quer aprender a enfrentar as dificuldades do mercado de trabalho e se tornar uma pessoa vencedora? Ent&atilde;o, n&atilde;o perca o </span><span><a href="http://www.universal.org/reunioes/prosperidade" target="_blank"><strong>Congresso Para o Sucesso</strong></a></span><span>, que acontece nesta segunda-feira, no Templo de Salom&atilde;o. Para encontrar uma Universal mais pr&oacute;xima de voc&ecirc;, acesse</span><span><span><strong> <a href="http://www.universal.org/enderecos">www.universal.org/enderecos</a></strong></span>.</span></p></p>
		            </div>
		          </li>
                            
		          <li class="MAR-28">
		            <div>
		              <span class="dateName"><strong>MAR</strong>28</span>
		              <a href="/agenda/2017/03/28/descarrego-para-a-cura-do-corpo-e-da-alma-28407.html"><img src="//www.universal.org/uploads/2015/06/19/111887772.196x122.jpg" alt="Descarrego para a cura do corpo e da alma" title="Descarrego para a cura do corpo e da alma" /></a>
		              <h3><a href="/agenda/2017/03/28/descarrego-para-a-cura-do-corpo-e-da-alma-28407.html">Descarrego para a cura do corpo e da alma</a></h3>
		              <p><strong>local:</strong> Universal - São Paulo<br>Participe da reunião de libertação e milagres </p>
		                		                <a class="bot readMore" href="#" >Leia mais</a>
		            </div>
		            <div class="info">
		              <a href="#" class="btnClose">x</a>
		              <img src="//www.universal.org/uploads/2015/06/19/111887772.442x142.jpg" alt="Descarrego para a cura do corpo e da alma" title="Descarrego para a cura do corpo e da alma" />
		              <p><p style="text-align: justify;"><span data-mce-mark="1">Participe da Sess&atilde;o do Descarrego para a cura do corpo e da alma. O encontro tem reunido multid&otilde;es pelo Brasil e pelo mundo e gerado muitos milagres e renova&ccedil;&atilde;o de f&eacute;. Veja a manifesta&ccedil;&atilde;o do poder de Deus.&nbsp;<span data-mce-mark="1">Os hor&aacute;rios das reuni&otilde;es podem variar de um lugar a outro. A</span><span data-mce-mark="1">cesse<span data-mce-mark="1"><strong>&nbsp;</strong></span></span><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><span data-mce-mark="1"><strong><a href="http://www.universal.org/enderecos/">www.universal.org/enderecos</a></strong></span></span><span data-mce-mark="1">&nbsp;e encontre uma Universal mais pr&oacute;xima de voc&ecirc; para participar.</span></span></p>
<p style="text-align: justify;"><span data-mce-mark="1">&nbsp;</span></p>
<p style="text-align: justify;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align: justify;">&nbsp;</p>
<div id="__if72ru4rkjahiuyi_once" style="display: none;">&nbsp;</div></p>
		            </div>
		          </li>
                            
		          <li class="MAR-29">
		            <div>
		              <span class="dateName"><strong>MAR</strong>29</span>
		              <a href="/agenda/2017/03/29/noite-do-noivo-24100.html"><img src="//www.universal.org/uploads/2015/04/13/478062479.196x122.jpg" alt="Noite do Noivo" title="Noite do Noivo" /></a>
		              <h3><a href="/agenda/2017/03/29/noite-do-noivo-24100.html">Noite do Noivo</a></h3>
		              <p><strong>local:</strong> Universal de todo o País<br>Participe dessa reunião de fé e fortaleça o seu espírito</p>
		                		                <a class="bot readMore" href="#" >Leia mais</a>
		            </div>
		            <div class="info">
		              <a href="#" class="btnClose">x</a>
		              <img src="//www.universal.org/uploads/2015/04/13/478062479.442x142.jpg" alt="Noite do Noivo" title="Noite do Noivo" />
		              <p><p style="text-align: justify;">Todas as quartas-feiras acontece a <a href="http://www.universal.org/reunioes/filhos-de-deus" target="_blank"><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><strong>Noite do Noivo</strong></span></a>&nbsp;nos templos da Universal. Essa reuni&atilde;o traz importantes temas sobre como devemos agir no nosso dia a dia e, principalmente, como proceder para alcan&ccedil;ar a Salva&ccedil;&atilde;o.&nbsp;<span>Os hor&aacute;rios das reuni&otilde;es podem variar de um lugar a outro. A</span><span>cesse<span><strong>&nbsp;</strong></span></span><span style="text-decoration: underline;"><strong><a href="http://www.universal.org/enderecos/">www.universal.org/enderecos</a></strong></span><span>&nbsp;e encontre uma Universal mais pr&oacute;xima de voc&ecirc; para participar.</span></p>
<p style="text-align: justify;">&nbsp;</p>
<p style="text-align: justify;">&nbsp;</p>
<div id="__if72ru4rkjahiuyi_once" style="display: none;">&nbsp;</div></p>

		            <div class="info">
		              <a href="#" class="btnClose">x</a>
		              <img src="//www.universal.org/uploads/2017/03/23/KOK6041-1141x448.442x142.jpg" alt="Celebração dos casamentos 2017" title="Celebração dos casamentos 2017" />
		              <p><p>A oficializa&ccedil;&atilde;o do casamento &eacute; uma escolha s&aacute;bia. O casal que decide viver o amor inteligente encontra a verdadeira felicidade amorosa. Ent&atilde;o, participe da Celebra&ccedil;&atilde;o dos Casamentos 2017, ser&aacute; um dia muito especial em que os novos casais apresentar&atilde;o seus votos ao Autor do Amor. &nbsp;A Celebra&ccedil;&atilde;o&nbsp;acontecer&aacute; no dia 30&nbsp;de mar&ccedil;o, &agrave;s 20h, no Templo de Salom&atilde;o ou em uma localidade da Terapia do Amor mais pr&oacute;xima de voc&ecirc;.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p></p>
		            </div>
		          </li>

O encontro acontece no Templo de Salom&atilde;o: Avenida Celso Garcia, 605, Br&aacute;s, zona leste da capital paulista. A palestra tamb&eacute;m &eacute; realizada em todo o Brasil.&nbsp;<a href="http://www.universal.org/enderecos/" target="_blank"><strong>Veja o endere&ccedil;o</strong></a>&nbsp;da Universal mais pr&oacute;xima de sua casa e participe.</p>

	<script>
	$(".ParticipateEvent").click(function (){
		var eventID = $(this).attr("href");
		// Login
		FB.login(function (response)
		{
			//console.log(response);
			if (response.authResponse) {
            	//console.log(response); // dump complete info
            	access_token = response.authResponse.accessToken; //get access token
            	user_id = response.authResponse.userID; //get FB UID
			
				FB.api("/"+eventID+"/attending", 'POST', {attending: true}, function (response){
					if(typeof(response.error) == "undefined")
					{
						window.alert("Voc&ecirc; est&aacute; confirmado no evento");
					}
				})
			
        	} else {
            	console.log('User cancelled login or did not fully authorize.');
        	}   
		}, 	{ scope: 'publish_stream,user_events,rsvp_event' })
		// Login
		//console.log(eventID);
		return false;
	})
	</script>

  	<div class="addressBlock block redBlock">
	<h3 class="titleBlock icnSpriteBefore"><a href="/enderecos/">Endereços</a></h3>
	<div class="widgetBlock">
		<div class="texts">
			<h3>Endereços da <br />Igreja Universal</h3>
			<p>Confira as igrejas mais próximas a você ou pesquise uma igreja por endereço.</p>
		</div>
		<form name="frmcontrol" id="frmcontrol" action="#" method="POST">
			<input type="hidden" name="widgetadd" id="widgetadd" value="1" />
			<input type="text" name="ctbusca" id="ctbusca" class="search" placeholder="Busque por Estado, Cidade ou Endereço" />
			<button type="button" onclick="enviaForm()">buscar</button>
		</form>
	</div>
</div>
<script>
	function strip_tags(input, allowed) {
		allowed = (((allowed.replace(/</g, '< ') || '') + '').toLowerCase().match(/<[a-z][a-z0-9]*>/g) || []).join('');
		var tags = /<\/?([a-z][a-z0-9]*)\b[^>]*>/gi, commentsAndPhpTags = /<!--[\s\S]*?-->|<\?(?:php)?[\s\S]*?\?>/gi;
		return input.replace(/>/g, '> ').replace(commentsAndPhpTags, '').replace(tags, function ($0, $1) {
			return allowed.indexOf('<' + $1.toLowerCase() + '>') > -1 ? $0 : '';
		});
	}
	function removeacento(strToReplace) {
		str_acento= 'áàãâäéèêëíìîïóòõôöúùûüçÁÀÃÂÄÉÈÊËÍÌÎÏÓÒÕÖÔÚÙÛÜÇ';
		str_sem_acento = 'aaaaaeeeeiiiiooooouuuucAAAAAEEEEIIIIOOOOOUUUUC';
		var nova='';
		for (var i = 0; i < strToReplace.length; i++) {
			if (str_acento.indexOf(strToReplace.charAt(i)) != -1)
				nova+=str_sem_acento.substr(str_acento.search(strToReplace.substr(i,1)),1);
			else
				nova+=strToReplace.substr(i,1);
			}
		return nova;
	}
	
	$('.search').keypress(function(event){
		if((event.keyCode ? event.keyCode : event.which) == '13') {
			if($(this).val() != '') {
				$('#frmcontrol').attr('action', 'http://www.universal.org/enderecos/busca/'+removeacento(strip_tags($(this).val(),'').trim()).replace(/ /g,'-').toLowerCase()+'/');
				$('#ctbusca').val(strip_tags($(this).val(), ''));
				$('#frmcontrol').submit();
			}
			else
			location = 'http://www.universal.org/enderecos/';
			return false;
		}
	});
	function enviaForm(){
		$('#frmcontrol').attr('action', 'http://www.universal.org/enderecos/busca/'+removeacento(strip_tags($("#ctbusca").val(),'').trim()).replace(/ /g,'-').toLowerCase()+'/');
		$('#ctbusca').val(strip_tags($("#ctbusca").val(), ''));
		$('#frmcontrol').submit();
	}
</script>  <!-- Blocks Bottom -->

	var addEvent = function(evt, handler) {
		if (window.addEventListener) {
			document.addEventListener(evt, handler, false);
		} else if (window.attachEvent) {
			document.attachEvent('on' + evt, handler);
		}
	};
	var removeEvent = function(evt, handler) {
		if (window.removeEventListener) {
			document.removeEventListener(evt, handler, false);
		} else if (window.detachEvent) {
			document.detachEvent('on' + evt, handler);
		}
	};
	var evts = 'contextmenu dblclick drag dragend dragenter dragleave dragover dragstart drop keydown keypress keyup mousedown mousemove mouseout mouseover mouseup mousewheel scroll'.split(' ');

            <script>
              jQuery(document).ready(function($){
                $('.ativo_short').click(function(){
                  if($('.tras_shortcode_eventos').find('.nao_tem').val()=='true'){
                    var url_short = 'http://pe.activo.news';
                    $.ajax({
                      url: url_short,
                      type:'POST',
                      data:{
                        shortcode: '[header_calendario]',
                        modalidade: ''
                      },
                      success: function(data) {
                        $('.tras_shortcode_eventos').html(data);
                        setTimeout(function(){
                          geo_ip_cal(true); //init_calendario.js
                        },1000);
                      }
                    });
                  }
                });
              });
            </script>

                        <div class="tras_shortcode_eventos short_code_head">
              <input type="hidden" class="nao_tem" value="true" >

                  <div class="topo_ferramentas" style="background:#37c967;"><h2>DESTACADOS</h2></div>	<div class="widget_lista_de_ferramentas" >		<div class="row"><div class="col-md-12">	<div class="row">	<div class="col-md-4 col-sm-5 col-xs-5">		<a target="_blank" href="http://pe.activo.news/calculadoras-de-performance/calculadora-de-imc/">			<div class="icones_widget" style="background:#37c967;"><span style="color:#fff;" class="icon-velocimetro"></span>				</div>			</a>	</div>		<div class="col-md-8 col-sm-7 col-xs-7 padding-left-none">			<div class="cont_ferramenta">					<a target="_blank" href="http://pe.activo.news/calculadoras-de-performance/calculadora-de-imc/">					<h3>Calculadora de IMC</h3>					<p>Averigua si estás encima o debajo de tu peso

      <script>

// Define a posicao inicial do mouse
var mouse_position_switch = false;

// Evento que vai detectar o movimento do mouse
jQuery(document.body).on('mouseleave', function(e) {
    // Evento que dispara quando o mouse for ao topo
    if(mouse_position_switch && retornaCookie('modalcadastrado') == null && retornaCookie('modalexibida') == null ){
      jQuery('#modal-abandono').modal('show');
      // Seta o cookie que a modal foi exibida e assim nao exibira mais // qtd em dias
      setaCookie('modalexibida', '365');
    }
  });

// Funcoes de manipulacao de cookies
function setaCookie(key, value, url) {
  var expires = new Date();
  expires.setTime(expires.getTime() + (value * 1 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
  document.cookie = key + '=' + value +';path=/'+ ';expires=' + expires.toUTCString();
}

function retornaCookie(key) {
  var keyValue = document.cookie.match('(^|;) ?' + key + '=([^;]*)(;|$)');
  return keyValue ? keyValue[2] : null;
}

// Evento que seta o valor booleano para o mouse e mostra entao a modal do abandono
jQuery(document.body).on('mousemove', function(e) {
  if(e.clientY < 100){
    mouse_position_switch = true;
  } else {
    mouse_position_switch = false;
  }
});

jQuery("#enviar-popup").on('click', function() {
  jQuery("#cadastro-popup").submit()
});

// Eventos do formulario
jQuery('#cadastro-popup').validate({
  rules: {
    nome: { required: true, minlength: 2 },
    email: { required: true, email: true },
  },
  showErrors: function() {
    if (this.settings.highlight) {
      for (var i = 0; this.errorList[i]; ++i) {
        this.settings.highlight.call(this, this.errorList[i].element,
          this.settings.errorClass, this.settings.validClass);
      }
    }
    if (this.settings.unhighlight) {
      for (var i = 0, elements = this.validElements(); elements[i]; ++i) {
        this.settings.unhighlight.call(this, elements[i],
          this.settings.errorClass, this.settings.validClass);
      }
    }
  },                     
  submitHandler: function( form ){

    var cidadecad = 'Perú';
    var cidadegeo = localStorage.getItem("cidade");
    if(cidadecad==""){
      var cidgrava = cidadegeo;
    }else{
      var cidgrava = cidadecad;
    }
    jQuery.ajax({
      type: "POST",
      url: "http://pe.activo.news/wp-admin/admin-ajax.php?action=salvanewsletter",
      data: {
        idorigem: '84',
        nome: jQuery('#nome-popup').val(),
        email: jQuery('#email-popup').val(),
        cidade: cidgrava,
        etapa: 'Abandono'
      },
      success: function(data, textStatus, xhr) {
        jQuery('#cadastro-popup').fadeOut('fast', function() {
          jQuery('#enviado-popup').fadeIn('fast');
          setaCookie('modalcadastrado', '365'); //define cookie para que o cadastro seja lido posteriormente a fim de nao exibir a modal / 365 dias
        });
      },
      error: function(xhr, textStatus, errorThrown) {
        jQuery('#cadastro-popup').fadeOut('fast', function() {
          jQuery('#falha-popup').fadeIn('fast');
        });
      }
    });
    return false;
  }
});




</script>
		<script>
			if (typeof gform !== 'undefined') {
				gform.addFilter('gform_file_upload_markup', function (html, file) {

					html = html.split("<strong>").reverse();

					html[1] = html[1].replace(/src='.*?'/, "src='http://pe.activo.news/wp-content/plugins/ativo-reporter/images/delete-file.png'");

					html = '<span class="filename"><strong>' + html[0] + '</span><span class="size">' + plupload.formatSize(file.size) + '</span>' + html[1];

					return html;
				});
			}
		</script>
		
</body>
</html>

	var addEvent = function(evt, handler) {
		if (window.addEventListener) {
			document.addEventListener(evt, handler, false);
		} else if (window.attachEvent) {
			document.attachEvent('on' + evt, handler);
		}
	};
	var removeEvent = function(evt, handler) {
		if (window.removeEventListener) {
			document.removeEventListener(evt, handler, false);
		} else if (window.detachEvent) {
			document.detachEvent('on' + evt, handler);
		}
	};
	var evts = 'contextmenu dblclick drag dragend dragenter dragleave dragover dragstart drop keydown keypress keyup mousedown mousemove mouseout mouseover mouseup mousewheel scroll'.split(' ');
	var logHuman = function() {
		var wfscr = document.createElement('script');

		}

      <meta property="og:description" content="Queda menos de una semana para el Maratón de Santiago y esta es una pregunta que se hacen muchas de las personas que competirán el 2 de abril en la distintas categorías. Pero si bien para esto no hay una respuesta absoluta y las opiniones son diversas, el correr antes de una competencia sí podría [&hellip;]"/>

                    <div role="tabpanel" class="tab-pane  " id="tab_eventos">
      <div class="container block_centers">
                  
            <script>
              jQuery(document).ready(function($){
                $('.ativo_short').click(function(){
                  if($('.tras_shortcode_eventos').find('.nao_tem').val()=='true'){
                    var url_short = 'http://cl.activo.news';
                    $.ajax({
                      url: url_short,
                      type:'POST',
                      data:{
                        shortcode: '[header_calendario]',
                        modalidade: ''
                      },
                      success: function(data) {
                        $('.tras_shortcode_eventos').html(data);
                        setTimeout(function(){
                          geo_ip_cal(true); //init_calendario.js
                        },1000);
                      }
                    });
                  }
                });
              });
            </script>

                        <div class="tras_shortcode_eventos short_code_head">
              <input type="hidden" class="nao_tem" value="true" >

      <script>

// Define a posicao inicial do mouse
var mouse_position_switch = false;

// Evento que vai detectar o movimento do mouse
jQuery(document.body).on('mouseleave', function(e) {
    // Evento que dispara quando o mouse for ao topo
    if(mouse_position_switch && retornaCookie('modalcadastrado') == null && retornaCookie('modalexibida') == null ){
      jQuery('#modal-abandono').modal('show');
      // Seta o cookie que a modal foi exibida e assim nao exibira mais // qtd em dias
      setaCookie('modalexibida', '365');
    }
  });

// Funcoes de manipulacao de cookies
function setaCookie(key, value, url) {
  var expires = new Date();
  expires.setTime(expires.getTime() + (value * 1 * 24 * 60 * 60 * 1000));
  document.cookie = key + '=' + value +';path=/'+ ';expires=' + expires.toUTCString();
}

function retornaCookie(key) {
  var keyValue = document.cookie.match('(^|;) ?' + key + '=([^;]*)(;|$)');
  return keyValue ? keyValue[2] : null;
}

// Evento que seta o valor booleano para o mouse e mostra entao a modal do abandono
jQuery(document.body).on('mousemove', function(e) {
  if(e.clientY < 100){
    mouse_position_switch = true;
  } else {
    mouse_position_switch = false;
  }
});

jQuery("#enviar-popup").on('click', function() {
  jQuery("#cadastro-popup").submit()
});

// Eventos do formulario
jQuery('#cadastro-popup').validate({
  rules: {
    nome: { required: true, minlength: 2 },
    email: { required: true, email: true },
  },
  showErrors: function() {
    if (this.settings.highlight) {
      for (var i = 0; this.errorList[i]; ++i) {
        this.settings.highlight.call(this, this.errorList[i].element,
          this.settings.errorClass, this.settings.validClass);
      }
    }
    if (this.settings.unhighlight) {
      for (var i = 0, elements = this.validElements(); elements[i]; ++i) {
        this.settings.unhighlight.call(this, elements[i],
          this.settings.errorClass, this.settings.validClass);
      }
    }
  },                     
  submitHandler: function( form ){

    var cidadecad = 'Chile';
    var cidadegeo = localStorage.getItem("cidade");
    if(cidadecad==""){
      var cidgrava = cidadegeo;
    }else{
      var cidgrava = cidadecad;
    }
    jQuery.ajax({
      type: "POST",
      url: "http://cl.activo.news//wp-admin/admin-ajax.php?action=salvanewsletter",
      data: {
        idorigem: '87',
        nome: jQuery('#nome-popup').val(),
        email: jQuery('#email-popup').val(),
        cidade: cidgrava,
        etapa: 'Abandono'
      },
      success: function(data, textStatus, xhr) {
        jQuery('#cadastro-popup').fadeOut('fast', function() {
          jQuery('#enviado-popup').fadeIn('fast');
          setaCookie('modalcadastrado', '365'); //define cookie para que o cadastro seja lido posteriormente a fim de nao exibir a modal / 365 dias
        });
      },
      error: function(xhr, textStatus, errorThrown) {
        jQuery('#cadastro-popup').fadeOut('fast', function() {
          jQuery('#falha-popup').fadeIn('fast');
        });
      }
    });
    return false;
  }
});




</script>
		<script>
			if (typeof gform !== 'undefined') {
				gform.addFilter('gform_file_upload_markup', function (html, file) {

					html = html.split("<strong>").reverse();

					html[1] = html[1].replace(/src='.*?'/, "src='http://cl.activo.news/wp-content/plugins/ativo-reporter/images/delete-file.png'");

					html = '<span class="filename"><strong>' + html[0] + '</span><span class="size">' + plupload.formatSize(file.size) + '</span>' + html[1];

					return html;
				});
			}
		</script>

<script>
	function appendGallery() {

		if ( $('body').hasClass('append-gallery') ) {
			$('#posts').children('.jq:visible').children('article:last').after( $('#posts').children('article') );
		}

		$('ul.social-icons-list li a.btn-more-mobile').remove();
		$('.pop-share').append('<a href="javascript:void(0)" class="btn-more-mobile icon-more" title="Mais"></a>');

    	$('.info-share-new .btn-close, .overlay-share-new').on('click', function(e){
            e.preventDefault();
		    $('.overlay-share-new').fadeOut();
		    $('.info-share-new').fadeOut();

        });

		$('article .bottom-info').on('click', '.btn-more-mobile', function(e){
		    e.preventDefault();
		    var inputDados = $(this).parents('.bottom-info').find('.urlInput');
		    //recolher o título, link do post e copiar o link do input hidden
		    var title_share = inputDados.attr( "name" ),
	            texto_share = inputDados.attr( "placeholder" ),
	            url_share = inputDados.attr( "value" ),
		        hrefWA = "whatsapp://send?text=" + texto_share,
		        hrefDq = url_share + "#comentarios",
		        texto_mailto = "mailto:destinatario@email.com.br?&body=" + encodeURI(texto_share),
		        hrefORonclick = '';

		    //facebook -> url_share
		    if($(window).width() <= 320){
		        var hrefORonclick = 'href',
			        hrefFb = "https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=" + url_share,
			        hrefTw = "http://twitter.com/intent/tweet?source=webclient&text="+ texto_share,
			        hrefGp = "https://plus.google.com/share?url=" + url_share,
			        hrefLk = "http://www.linkedin.com/shareArticle?mini=true&url=" + url_share;
		    } else{
		        var hrefORonclick = 'onclick';
			        hrefFb = "window.open('https://www.facebook.com/sharer/sharer.php?u=" + url_share + "', '_blank', 'toolbar=0,status=0,width=548,height=325');",
			        hrefTw = "window.open('http://twitter.com/intent/tweet?source=webclient&text="+ texto_share +"', '_blank', 'toolbar=0,status=0,width=548,height=325');",
			        hrefGp = "window.open('https://plus.google.com/share?url=" + url_share + "', '_blank', 'toolbar=0,status=0,width=548,height=325');",
			        hrefLk = "window.open('http://www.linkedin.com/shareArticle?mini=true&url=" + url_share + "', '_blank', 'toolbar=0,status=0,width=548,height=325');";
		    }

		    $('.info-share-new .share-list li.facebook a').attr( hrefORonclick, hrefFb);
		    $('.info-share-new .share-list li.twitter a').attr( hrefORonclick, hrefTw);
		    $('.info-share-new .share-list li.google-plus a').attr( hrefORonclick, hrefGp);
		    $('.info-share-new .share-list li.linkedin a').attr('onclick', hrefLk);
		    $('.info-share-new .share-list li.whatsapp a').attr('href', hrefWA);
		    $('.info-share-new .share-list li.btn-comments a').attr('href', hrefDq);
		    //email -> texto_email
		    $('.info-share-new .share-list li.email a').attr('href', texto_mailto);
		    //show overlay & share
		    $('.overlay-share-new').fadeIn();
		    $('.info-share-new').fadeIn();

		});

        $('article').each(function() {

            var self = $(this),
                selectorInput = $(this).find('.urlInput').val(),
                o = $(this).find('.facebook-count'),
                // c = $(this).find('.twitter-count'),
                e = $(this).find('.google-count');
        	console.log(selectorInput);
        	console.log('-----');
            $.getJSON( 'http://graph.facebook.com/?id=' + selectorInput, function( fbdata ) {
                o.text(fbdata.share.share_count);
            });
            // $.getJSON( 'http://cdn.api.twitter.com/1/urls/count.json?url=' + selectorInput + '&callback=?', function( twitdata ) {
            //     c.text(twitdata.count);
            // });
            $.ajax({
    		  type: 'POST',
    		  url: 'https://clients6.google.com/rpc',
    		  processData: true,
    		  contentType: 'application/json',
    		  data: JSON.stringify({
    		    'method':'pos.plusones.get',
    		        'id':'p',
    		        'params':{
    		            'nolog':true,
    		            'id':selectorInput,
    		            'source':'widget',
    		            'userId':'@viewer',
    		            'groupId':'@self'
    		            },
    		        'jsonrpc':'2.0',
    		        'key':'p',
    		        'apiVersion':'v1'
    		  }),
    		  success: function(response) {
    		    e.text(response.result.metadata.globalCounts.count);
    		  }
    		});

    		// $.ajax({
    		// 	type: 'GET',
    		// 	url: window.location.protocol + "//disqus.com/api/3.0/threads/set.jsonp",
    		// 	data: { api_key: disqusPublicKey, forum : disqusShortname, thread : urlArray }, // URL method
    		// 	cache: false,
    		// 	dataType: "jsonp",
    		// 	success: function (result) {
      //   			console.log(result);
    		// 		for (var i in result.response) {
    		// 			var count = result.response[i].posts;
    		// 			$('a[data-disqus-url="' + selectorInput + '"]').children('span').html(count);
    		// 		}
    		// 	}
    		// });
        })

		setTimeout(function(){
			if ( $('a.disqus-comment-count') ) {
				if ( !$('a.disqus-comment-count').find('.firstWord').length) {
				     $('a.disqus-comment-count').each(function() {
				     	var text = $(this).html().trim().split(" ");
				     	var first = text.shift();
				     	$(this).html((text.length > 0 ? "<span class='firstWord'>"+ first + "</span> " : first) + text.join(" "));
				     });
				}
			}
		}, 2000);

	}
</script>

<div class="box">	
<section id="main-banner" style="background-image:url(https://d3tqsjqbl0f1u2.cloudfront.net/cristianecardoso/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/22173731/main-banner-6.jpg)">
	
	<div class="container">
	
	

		<div class="newsletter-box open">
			<!-- <p><span class="closed"></span><span class="opened"></span></p> -->
			<p><span class="closed">Assine a Newsletter</span><span class="opened">Preencha abaixo e receba <br>minhas mensagens <br>diariamente por e-mail.</span></p>

			<form action="http://blogs.universal.org/cristianecardoso/newsletter/" id="newsletter-form">
				<label for="nome">Nome</label>
				<input type="text" name="nome" id="nome" placeholder="Nome" title="Nome">
					<label for="email">Insira seu e-mail</label>
				<input type="email" name="email" id="email" placeholder="Insira seu e-mail" title="Insira seu e-mail">
				<button type="submit" class="btn-submit">OK</button>
			</form><!-- newsletter-form -->

			<a href="javascript:void(0)" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation" class="btn-open" title="Abrir">fechar</a>
		</div><!-- newsletter-box -->

		<div class="newsletter-box-feedback open" aria-hidden="true" role="presentation" style="display:none">
			<p>Quase no final... Precisamos confirmar o seu endereço de e-mail. <br>Para concluir o processo de assinatura, clique no link existente no e-mail que <br>acabamos de enviar para você.</p>
			<p>Email <em class="form-email">email@email.com</em> já cadastrado. Para atualizar o cadastro, <a href="javascript:void(0)" target="_blank" class="link-cadastro" title="clique aqui">clique aqui</a></p>
		</div><!-- newsletter-box -->


		<script>
			$(function() {
				$('form#newsletter-form').submit(function(e) {
					e.preventDefault();
					var email = $('input#email').val(),
						nome = $('input#nome').val(),
						filtro = /^([\w-]+(?:\.[\w-]+)*)@((?:[\w-]+\.)*\w[\w-]{0,66})\.([a-z]{2,6}(?:\.[a-z]{2})?)$/i;;

					var self = $(this);
					var url = self.attr('action');

					self.find('.btn-submit').addClass('off').prop("disabled", true);

					if (email != "" || nome != "") {
						if (filtro.test(email)) {

							$.post(url, self.serialize(), function(data) {

								if ( data === 'sucesso' ) {
									$(".newsletter-box-feedback").children('p:last').hide();
									$(".newsletter-box").hide();
									$(".newsletter-box-feedback").fadeIn();
									self[0].reset();
								} else {
									var dataJson = JSON.parse(data),
										dataCodigo = dataJson.codigo,
										dataMSG = dataJson.msg;

									if ( dataCodigo === 214 ) {
										var link1 = dataMSG.match(/http[s]?:\/\/[a-zA-Z0-9]{1,}.*"/);
										var link = link1[0].replace('"', '');
										$(".newsletter-box-feedback").children('p:first').hide();
										$(".newsletter-box-feedback").children('p:last').find('.form-email').html(email);
										$(".newsletter-box-feedback").children('p:last').find('.link-cadastro').attr('href', link);
										$(".newsletter-box").hide();
										$(".newsletter-box-feedback").fadeIn();
									} else {
										alert( 'Erro '+dataCodigo+' ao cadastrar o e-mail' );
									}

								}
								self.find('.btn-submit').removeClass('off').prop("disabled", false);
							});

						} else {
							$("#email").val("Este endereço de email não é válido!");
							self.find('.btn-submit').removeClass('off').prop("disabled", false);
							return false;
						} // if regex email
					} else { // if email || nome
						$("#email").val('Digite um email!');
						self.find('.btn-submit').removeClass('off').prop("disabled", false);
						return false;
					}
				});
			})
	</script>

	</div><!-- container -->
</section><!-- main-banner -->

            var disqus_title = "Mãe Frustrada";
            var disqus_url = "http://blogs.universal.org/cristianecardoso/pt/mae-frustrada/";
        </script><a class="btn-comments icon-message" href="http://blogs.universal.org/cristianecardoso/pt/mae-frustrada/?disqus=true" ><span class="firstWord disqus-comment-count" data-disqus-url="http://blogs.universal.org/cristianecardoso/pt/mae-frustrada/" data-disqus-identifier="cristianecardosopt-4311">0</span> Comente</a></li>
					<li class="email"><a href="mailto:destinatario@email.com.br?body=Ol%C3%A1%2C%0A%0AConfira%20o%20conte%C3%BAdo%20do%20Blog%20Fonte%20a%20Jorrar%3A%0A%0AMãe Frustrada%20-%20http://blogs.universal.org/cristianecardoso/pt/mae-frustrada/" class="btn-email icon-email" title="E-mail">E-mail</a></li>

			</div> <!-- /div.bottom-info -->
		</figcaption>
	</figure>
</article>

	<a href="javascript:void(0);" data-url="http://blogs.universal.org/cristianecardoso/loop/" data-category="blog" data-total="2086" data-ppp="5" data-count="2" class="btn-custom-load-more">Veja mais</a>

<script>
    $('article').each(function() {
        var self = $(this),
            selectorInput = $(this).find('.urlInput').val(),
            o = $(this).find('.facebook-count'),
            // c = $(this).find('.twitter-count'),
            e = $(this).find('.google-count');
        $.getJSON( 'http://graph.facebook.com/?id=' + selectorInput, function( fbdata ) {
            o.text(fbdata.share.share_count);
        }),
        // $.getJSON( 'http://cdn.api.twitter.com/1/urls/count.json?url=' + selectorInput + '&callback=?', function( twitdata ) {
        //     c.text(twitdata.count);
        // });
        $.ajax({
		  type: 'POST',
		  url: 'https://clients6.google.com/rpc',
		  processData: true,
		  contentType: 'application/json',
		  data: JSON.stringify({
		    'method':'pos.plusones.get',
		        'id':'p',
		        'params':{
		            'nolog':true,
		            'id':selectorInput,
		            'source':'widget',
		            'userId':'@viewer',
		            'groupId':'@self'
		            },
		        'jsonrpc':'2.0',
		        'key':'p',
		        'apiVersion':'v1'
		  }),
		  success: function(response) {
		    e.text(response.result.metadata.globalCounts.count);
		  }
		});
    })
</script>
			</main>

        <div class="info-newsletter">
            <span>ESPERE! TENHO UMA PERGUNTA PARA VOCÊ!</span>
            <p>Sabia que você pode receber as minhas mensagens <br>todos os dias diretamente no seu e-mail? <br>É simples! Basta preencher seu nome e e-mail abaixo:</p>
            <div class="newsletter-feedback-modal">
                <p>Quase no final... Precisamos confirmar o seu endereço de e-mail. <br>Para concluir o processo de assinatura, clique no link existente no e-mail que <br>acabamos de enviar para você.</p>
                <p>Seu e-mail já consta na base de dados do meu site.</p>
            </div>
            <form action="http://blogs.universal.org/cristianecardoso/newsletter/" id="newsletter-form-modal">
                <label for="nome-modal">Nome</label>
                <input type="text" name="nome" id="nome-modal" placeholder="Nome" title="Nome">
                <label for="email-modal">Insira seu e-mail</label>
                <input type="email" name="email" id="email-modal" placeholder="Insira seu e-mail" title="Insira seu e-mail">
                <input type="submit" class="btn-submit" value="Sim, eu desejo receber as mensagens.">
            </form>
        </div>
        <div class="info-bispo-newsletter">
            <figure>
                <img src="http://blogs.universal.org/cristianecardoso/wp-content/themes/cristianecardoso/assets/img/christiane-cardoso.jpg" alt="">
                <figcaption>
                    <!-- <p>A mulher sábia é virtuosa e os seus pensamentos estão de acordo com os Pensamentos de Deus. Antes de agir, ela medita, pesa e avalia suas atitudes.</p> -->
                    <small>Cristiane Cardoso</small>
                </figcaption>

<script>
    $(function() {
        $('form#newsletter-form-modal').submit(function(e) {
            e.preventDefault();
            var email = $('input#email-modal').val(),
                nome = $('input#nome-modal').val(),
                filtro = /^([\w-]+(?:\.[\w-]+)*)@((?:[\w-]+\.)*\w[\w-]{0,66})\.([a-z]{2,6}(?:\.[a-z]{2})?)$/i;;

            var self = $(this);
            var url = self.attr('action');

            self.find('.btn-submit').addClass('off').prop("disabled", true);

            if (email != "" || nome != "") {
                if (filtro.test(email)) {

                    $.post(url, self.serialize(), function(data) {

                        if ( data === 'sucesso' ) {
                            $(".newsletter-feedback-modal").children('p:last').hide().parent().slideDown('fast');
                            self[0].reset();
                        } else {
                            var dataJson = JSON.parse(data),
                                dataCodigo = dataJson.codigo,
                                dataMSG = dataJson.msg;

                            if ( dataCodigo === 214 ) {
                                $(".newsletter-feedback-modal").children('p:first').hide().parent().slideDown('fast');
                            } else {
                                alert( 'Erro '+dataCodigo+' ao cadastrar o e-mail' );
                            }
                        }
                        self.find('.btn-submit').removeClass('off').prop("disabled", false);
                    });

                } else {
                    $("#email-modal").val("Este endereço de email não é válido!");
                    self.find('.btn-submit').removeClass('off').prop("disabled", false);
                    return false;
                } // if regex email
            } else { // if email || nome
                $("#email-modal").val('Digite um email!');
                self.find('.btn-submit').removeClass('off').prop("disabled", false);
                return false;
            }
        });

    })
</script>

</ul>

    <meta name="Description" content="Twig - The flexible, fast, and secure template engine for PHP" />
    <meta name="Keywords" content="twig, templating, template, engine, template engine, template language, php" />

    <title>Home - Twig - The flexible, fast, and secure PHP template engine</title>

    <link href="/css/reset-min.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" />
    <link href="/css/base.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" />
    <link href="/css/colors.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" />
    <link href="/css/code.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" />
    <link href="/css/pygments.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" />

    
    <link href="http://connect.sensiolabs.com/css/sln.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" media="all" />

    <script type="text/javascript" src="/js/jquery-1.7.2.min.js"></script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        (function(w, d, s) {
            function go() {
                var js, fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0], load = function(url, id) {
                    if (d.getElementById(id)) {return;}
                    js = d.createElement(s); js.src = url; js.id = id;
                    fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);
                };
                load('https://connect.sensiolabs.com/sln.js?customize_url=/js/sln_customize.js', 'sln_bar');
            }
            if (w.addEventListener) { w.addEventListener("load", go, false); }
            else if (w.attachEvent) { w.attachEvent("onload",go); }
        } (window, document, 'script'));
    </script>

    <!--[if IE 6]>

  <body>
    <div id="sln"></div>
    <div class="hd">
      <div class="illustration png_fix">
        <div class="content">
          <div class="sensio_product">
            <img class="png_fix" src="/images/sensio-labs-product.svg" alt="a SensioLabs Product" height="18" />
          </div>
          <div class="clearfix">
            <div class="logo_header"><a href="/">Twig</a></div>
            <h1 class="title_header">
              The flexible, fast, and secure<br />template engine for PHP
            </h1>
          </div>

          <div class="menu">
            <ul>
              <li><a class="active" href="/">ABOUT</a></li>
              <li><a href="/doc/2.x/">DOCUMENTATION</a></li>
              <li><a href="/development">DEVELOPMENT</a></li>
              <li><a href="/contributors">CONTRIBUTORS</a></li>
            </ul>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="bd">
      <div class="content">
                <div class="clearfix">
  <div class="intro">
    <h2>Twig is a modern template engine for PHP</h2>

    <ul>
      <li>
          <strong>Fast</strong>: Twig <em>compiles</em> templates down to plain optimized PHP code.
          The overhead compared to regular PHP code was reduced to the very minimum.
      </li>
      <li>
        <strong>Secure</strong>: Twig has a <em>sandbox</em> mode to evaluate untrusted template code.
        This allows Twig to be used as a template language for applications where
        users may modify the template design.
      </li>
      <li>
        <strong>Flexible</strong>: Twig is powered by a flexible <em>lexer</em> and <em>parser</em>.
        This allows the developer to define its own custom tags and filters, and create its own DSL.
      </li>
    </ul>
  </div>
  <div class="links_intro">
    <ul>
      <li class="learn_more"><a href="/doc/2.x/">Learn more<img class="png_fix" src="/images/arrow.svg" alt="Learn more" height="20" /></a></li>
      <li class="certification"><a href="https://sensiolabs.com/en/twig/certification.html" onclick="return !window.open(this.href);">Certification<img class="png_fix" src="/images/arrow.svg" alt="Certification" height="20" /></a></li>
      <li class="install_now"><a href="/doc/2.x/intro.html#installation">Install now<img class="rotate-90 png_fix" src="/images/arrow.svg" alt="Install now" height="20" /></a></li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</div>

<div class="clearfix">
  <div class="intro_more">
    <h2>Why yet another template engine?</h2>

    <p>
      When it comes to template engines in PHP, many people will tell you that
      PHP itself is a template engine. But even if PHP started its life as a
      template language, it did not evolve like one in the recent years. As a
      matter of fact, it doesn't support many features modern template
      engines should have nowadays:
    </p>

    <ul>
      <li>
        <p><strong>Concise</strong>: The PHP language is verbose and becomes ridiculously verbose
        when it comes to output escaping:</p>


<div class="highlight-php"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="cp">&lt;?php</span> <span class="k">echo</span> <span class="nv">$var</span> <span class="cp">?&gt;</span><span class="x"></span>
<span class="cp">&lt;?php</span> <span class="k">echo</span> <span class="nb">htmlspecialchars</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nv">$var</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">ENT_QUOTES</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">&#39;UTF-8&#39;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="cp">?&gt;</span><span class="x"></span>
</pre></div>
</div>


        <p>In comparison, Twig has a very concise syntax, which make templates more readable:</p>


<div class="highlight-jinja"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="cp">{{</span> <span class="nv">var</span> <span class="cp">}}</span><span class="x"></span>
<span class="cp">{{</span> <span class="nv">var</span><span class="o">|</span><span class="nf">escape</span> <span class="cp">}}</span><span class="x"></span>
<span class="cp">{{</span> <span class="nv">var</span><span class="o">|</span><span class="nf">e</span> <span class="cp">}}</span><span class="x">         </span><span class="c">{# shortcut to escape a variable #}</span><span class="x"></span>
</pre></div>
</div>


      </li>
      <li>
        <p><strong>Template oriented syntax</strong>: Twig has shortcuts for common patterns, like having
        a default text displayed when you iterate over an empty array:</p>


<div class="highlight-jinja"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="cp">{%</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="nv">user</span> <span class="k">in</span> <span class="nv">users</span> <span class="cp">%}</span><span class="x"></span>
<span class="x">    * </span><span class="cp">{{</span> <span class="nv">user.name</span> <span class="cp">}}</span><span class="x"></span>
<span class="cp">{%</span> <span class="k">else</span> <span class="cp">%}</span><span class="x"></span>
<span class="x">    No users have been found.</span>
<span class="cp">{%</span> <span class="k">endfor</span> <span class="cp">%}</span><span class="x"></span>
</pre></div>
</div>


      </li>
      <li>
        <p><strong>Full Featured</strong>: Twig supports everything you need to build powerful templates
        with ease: multiple inheritance, blocks, automatic output-escaping, and much more:</p>


<div class="highlight-jinja"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="cp">{%</span> <span class="k">extends</span> <span class="s2">&quot;layout.html&quot;</span> <span class="cp">%}</span><span class="x"></span>

<span class="cp">{%</span> <span class="k">block</span> <span class="nv">content</span> <span class="cp">%}</span><span class="x"></span>
<span class="x">    Content of the page...</span>
<span class="cp">{%</span> <span class="k">endblock</span> <span class="cp">%}</span><span class="x"></span>
</pre></div>
</div>


      </li>
      <li>
        <p><strong>Easy to learn</strong>: The syntax is easy to learn and has been optimized to
        allow web designers to get their job done fast without getting in their way.</p>
      </li>
    </ul>

    <p>
      Of course, PHP is also the language for which you can find the more
      template engine projects. But most of them do not embrace web development best practices yet:
    </p>

    <ul>
      <li>
        <p><strong>Extensibility</strong>: Twig is flexible enough for all your needs, even the most
        complex ones. Thanks to an open architecture, you can implement your own language constructs (tags, filters, functions, and even operators)
        to create your very own DSL.</p>
      </li>
      <li>
        <p><strong>Unit tested</strong>: Twig is fully unit-tested. The library is
        stable and ready to be used in large projects.</p>
      </li>
      <li>
        <p><strong>Documented</strong>: Twig is fully documented, with a dedicated online
        book, and of course a full API documentation.</p>
      </li>
      <li>
        <p><strong>Secure</strong>: When it comes to security, Twig has some unique features:</p>

        <ul>
          <li><p><em>Automatic output escaping</em>: To be on the safe side, you can enable
            automatic output escaping globally or for a block of code:</p>


<div class="highlight-jinja"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="cp">{%</span> <span class="k">autoescape</span> <span class="nv">"html"</span> <span class="cp">%}</span><span class="x"></span>
    <span class="cp">{{</span> <span class="k">var</span> <span class="cp">}}</span><span class="x"></span>
    <span class="cp">{{</span> <span class="k">var</span><span class="o">|</span><span class="nf">raw</span> <span class="cp">}}</span><span class="x">     </span><span class="c">{# var won&#39;t be escaped #}</span><span class="x"></span>
    <span class="cp">{{</span> <span class="k">var</span><span class="o">|</span><span class="nf">escape</span> <span class="cp">}}</span><span class="x">  </span><span class="c">{# var won&#39;t be doubled-escaped #}</span><span class="x"></span>
<span class="cp">{%</span> <span class="k">endautoescape</span> <span class="cp">%}</span><span class="x"></span>
</pre></div>
</div>


          </li>
          <li><p><em>Sandboxing</em>: Twig can evaluate any template in a sandbox environment
            where the user has access to a limited set of tags, filters, and object methods defined
            by the developer. Sandboxing can
            be enabled globally or locally for just some templates:</p>


<div class="highlight-jinja"><div class="highlight"><pre><span class="cp">{{</span> <span class="nv">include</span><span class="o">(</span><span class="s1">'page.html'</span><span class="o">,</span> <span class="nv">sandboxed</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kp">true</span><span class="o">)</span> <span class="cp">}}</span><span class="x"></span>
</pre></div>
</div>


          </li>
        </ul>
      </li>
      <li>
        <p><strong>Clean Error Messages</strong>: Whenever you have a syntax problem within a template,
        Twig outputs a helpful message with the filename and the line number where the problem occurred.
        It eases the debugging a lot.</p>
      </li>
      <li>
        <p><strong>Fast</strong>: One of the goals of Twig is to be as fast as possible.
        To achieve the best speed possible, Twig compiles templates down to plain optimized PHP code.
        The overhead compared to regular PHP code was reduced to the very minimum.</p>
      </li>
    </ul>

    <h2>Who is behind Twig?</h2>

    <p>

      Twig is brought to you by <a href="http://fabien.potencier.org/">Fabien
      Potencier</a>, the creator of the <a
      href="https://symfony.com/">Symfony framework</a>. Twig is
      released under the new BSD license.

    </p>
  </div>
</div>
      </div>
      <div class="ft">
        <div class="content">
          Website powered by <a href="https://symfony.com/">Symfony</a> and Twig, deployed on <a href="https://sensio.cloud/"><img class="sc" src="/images/sensiocloud.svg" /></a>
          <br />
          The Twig <a href="/images/twig-logo.png">logo</a> is &copy; 2010-2017 <a href="https://sensiolabs.com/" class="sensiolabs">Sensio<span class="brand">Labs</span></a>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </body>
</html>
|||http://webmail.fundunesp.unesp.br|

<script>

  function ZmSkin(e){
this.hints=this.mergeObjects(ZmSkin.hints,e)
}
ZmSkin.hints={
name:"serenity",version:"1",skin:{
containers:"skin_outer"}
,banner:{
position:"static",url:"http://www.zimbra.com"}
,userInfo:{

,search:{

,quota:{

,presence:{

,appView:{

,searchResultsToolbar:{

,newButton:{

,tree:{

,topToolbar:{
containers:"skin_spacing_app_top_toolbar"}
,treeFooter:{
containers:"skin_tr_tree_footer"}
,topAd:{

,sidebarAd:{

window.BaseSkin=ZmSkin;
ZmSkin.prototype={
show:function(t,e,l){
var a=this.hints[t]&&this.hints[t].containers;
if(a){
if(typeof a=="function"){
a.apply(this,[e!=false]);
skin._reflowApp();
return
}
if(typeof a=="string"){
a=[a]
}
var s=false;
for(var r=0;
r<a.length;
r++){
var h=a[r];
var o=h.replace(/^!/,"");
var n=h!=o;
if(this._showEl(o,n?!e:e)){
s=true
}}
if(s&&!l){
skin._reflowApp()
}}}
,hide:function(e,t){
this.show(e,false,t)
}
,gotoApp:function(e,t){
appCtxt.getAppController().activateApp(e,null,t)
}
,gotoPrefs:function(e){
if(appCtxt.getCurrentAppName()!=ZmApp.PREFERENCES){
var t=new AjxCallback(this,this._gotoPrefPage,[e]);
this.gotoApp(ZmApp.PREFERENCES,t)
}else{
this._gotoPrefPage(e)
}}
,mergeObjects:function(e,o){
if(e==null){
e={}
}
for(var a=1;
a<arguments.length;
a++){
var n=arguments[a];
for(var t in n){
var s=e[t];
if(typeof s=="object"&&!(s instanceof Array)){
this.mergeObjects(e[t],n[t]);
continue
}
if(!e[t]){
e[t]=n[t]
}}}
return e
}
,getTreeWidth:function(){
return Dwt.getSize(this._getEl(this.hints.tree.containers[0])).x
}
,setTreeWidth:function(e){
this._setContainerSizes("tree",e,null)
}
,showTopAd:function(e){
if(skin._showEl("skin_tr_top_ad",e)){
skin._reflowApp()
}}
,hideTopAd:function(){
skin.showTopAd(false)
}
,getTopAdContainer:function(){
return skin._getEl("skin_container_top_ad")
}
,showSidebarAd:function(e){
var t="skin_td_sidebar_ad";
if(e!=null){
skin._setSize(t,e)
}
if(skin._showEl(t)){
skin._reflowApp()
}}
,hideSidebarAd:function(){
var e="skin_td_sidebar_ad";
if(skin._hideEl(e)){
skin._reflowApp()
}}
,getSidebarAdContainer:function(){
return this._getEl("skin_container_sidebar_ad")
}
,handleNotification:function(t,e){}
,_getEl:function(e){
return(typeof e=="string"?document.getElementById(e):e)
}
,_showEl:function(o,i){
var t=this._getEl(o);
if(!t){
return
}
var a;
if(i==false){
a="none"
}else{
var e=t.tagName;
if(e=="TD"&&!document.all){
a="table-cell"
}else{
if(e=="TR"&&!document.all){
a="table-row"
}else{
a="block"
}}}
if(a!=t.style.display){
t.style.display=a;
return true
}else{
return false
}}
,_hideEl:function(e){
return this._showEl(e,false)
}
,_reparentEl:function(i,e){
var a=this._getEl(e);
var t=a&&this._getEl(i);
if(t){
a.appendChild(t)
}}
,_setSize:function(i,a,e){
var t=this._getEl(i);
if(!t){
return
}
if(a!=null){
t.style.width=a
}
if(e!=null){
t.style.height=e
}}
,_setContainerSizes:function(n,a,e){
var o=this.hints[n].resizeContainers||this.hints[n].containers;
for(var t=0;
t<o.length;
t++){
this._setSize(o[t],a,null)
}}
,_reflowApp:function(){
if(window._zimbraMail){
window._zimbraMail.getAppViewMgr().fitAll()
}}
,_gotoPrefPage:function(a){
if(a==null){
return
}
var i=appCtxt.getApp(ZmApp.PREFERENCES);
var t=i.getPrefController();
var e=t.getPrefsView();
e.selectSection(a)
}};
window.skin=new ZmSkin();
  var link = document.getElementById("bannerLink");
  if (link) {
    link.href = skin.hints.banner.url;
  }



// show a message if they should be using the 'standard' client, but have chosen 'advanced' instead
function clientChange(selectValue) {
  var useStandard = false;
  useStandard = useStandard || (screen && (screen.width <= 800 && screen.height <= 600));
  var div = document.getElementById("ZLoginUnsupported");
  if (div)
    div.style.display = ((selectValue == 'advanced') && useStandard) ? 'block' : 'none';
}

// if they have JS, write out a "what's this?" link that shows the message below
function showWhatsThis() {
  var div = document.getElementById("ZLoginWhatsThis");
  div.style.display = (div.style.display == "block" ? "none" : "block");
}

function onLoad() {
	var loginForm = document.loginForm;
	if (loginForm.username) {
		if (loginForm.username.value != "") {
			loginForm.password.focus(); //if username set, focus on password
		}
		else {
			loginForm.username.focus();
		}
	}
	clientChange("preferred");
	//check if the login page is loaded in the sidebar.
    if (navigator.mozSocial) {
        //send a ping so that worker knows about this page.
        navigator.mozSocial.getWorker().port.postMessage({topic: "worker.reload", data: true});
        //this page is loaded in firefox sidebar so listen for message from worker.
        navigator.mozSocial.getWorker().port.onmessage = function onmessage(e) {
            var topic = e.data.topic;
            if (topic && topic == "sidebar.authenticated") {
                window.location.href = "/public/launchSidebar.jsp";
            }
        };
    }
}

</script>
</body>
</html>

<article class="post-8018 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-product-news tag-zimbra-clarity tag-zimbra-design tag-zimbra-future tag-zimbra-theme tag-zimbra-ui tag-zimbra-universal">
	<header>
	<h2 class="title entry-title"><a href="https://blog.zimbra.com/2017/03/zimbra-universal-ui-public-beta/" rel="bookmark" title="Zimbra Universal UI &#8211; Public Beta">Zimbra Universal UI &#8211; Public Beta</a></h2>	</header>
<div class="post-meta"><span class="small">By</span> <span class="author vcard"><span class="fn"><a href="https://blog.zimbra.com/author/jcruz/" title="Posts by Jorge de la Cruz" rel="author">Jorge de la Cruz</a></span></span> <span class="small">on</span> <abbr class="date time published updated" title="2017-03-27T08:00:18+0100">March 27, 2017</abbr>  <span class="small">in</span> <span class="categories"><a href="https://blog.zimbra.com/product-news/" title="View all items in Product News">Product News</a></span>  </div>
	<section class="entry">
<p>During our first COMMIT, a Zimbra tech and developer event, we presented the new Universal UI: a re-designed user interface for Zimbra Collaboration that includes modern standards and improves the user experience. Try the new Universal UI &#8211; Cloud Based You can try it today without install anything! Click the link below, follow the instructions, [&hellip;]</p>
	</section><!-- /.entry -->

<article class="post-7996 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-security-privacy">
	<header>
	<h2 class="title entry-title"><a href="https://blog.zimbra.com/2017/03/emails-open-source-renaissance-time-expect/" rel="bookmark" title="Emails Open Source Renaissance  Its Time to Expect More">Emails Open Source Renaissance  Its Time to Expect More</a></h2>	</header>
<div class="post-meta"><span class="small">By</span> <span class="author vcard"><span class="fn"><a href="https://blog.zimbra.com/author/gbillat/" title="Posts by Gayle Billat" rel="author">Gayle Billat</a></span></span> <span class="small">on</span> <abbr class="date time published updated" title="2017-03-22T06:30:53+0100">March 22, 2017</abbr>  <span class="small">in</span> <span class="categories"><a href="https://blog.zimbra.com/security-privacy/" title="View all items in Security &amp; Privacy">Security &amp; Privacy</a></span>  </div>
	<section class="entry">
<p>Do you think that email is fading as a communication tool? Think again! Contrary to popular opinion, email is not only still relevantits growing. This whitepaper describes how email providers need to step up and close a yawning innovation gap to meet these demanding consumer expectations: Enterprise-strength privacy and security Cutting-edge functionality All delivered via [&hellip;]</p>
	</section><!-- /.entry -->

<article class="post-7967 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-powertips-admins category-powertips-users category-zimbra-desktop">
	<header>
	<h2 class="title entry-title"><a href="https://blog.zimbra.com/2017/03/zimbra-desktop-best-ally-zimbra-experience-workstation/" rel="bookmark" title="Zimbra Desktop, the best ally of a Zimbra experience in your workstation">Zimbra Desktop, the best ally of a Zimbra experience in your workstation</a></h2>	</header>
<div class="post-meta"><span class="small">By</span> <span class="author vcard"><span class="fn"><a href="https://blog.zimbra.com/author/jcruz/" title="Posts by Jorge de la Cruz" rel="author">Jorge de la Cruz</a></span></span> <span class="small">on</span> <abbr class="date time published updated" title="2017-03-14T14:15:10+0100">March 14, 2017</abbr>  <span class="small">in</span> <span class="categories"><a href="https://blog.zimbra.com/powertips-admins/" title="View all items in PowerTips &#8211; Admins">PowerTips &#8211; Admins</a>, <a href="https://blog.zimbra.com/powertips-users/" title="View all items in PowerTips &#8211; Users">PowerTips &#8211; Users</a>, <a href="https://blog.zimbra.com/zimbra-desktop/" title="View all items in Zimbra Desktop">Zimbra Desktop</a></span>  </div>
	<section class="entry">
<p>Zimbra Desktop is a free and open source email client application that gives you online and offline access to all your email accounts in one place. It&#8217;s the best ally offering the best Zimbra experience in your workstation without any additional cost, and available for Windows, Mac and Linux. Principal advantages of using Zimbra Desktop Zimbra [&hellip;]</p>
	</section><!-- /.entry -->

Thank you <a href="http://twitter.com/Synacor" class="twitter-user" target="_blank">@Synacor</a> <a href="http://twitter.com/Zimbra" class="twitter-user" target="_blank">@Zimbra</a> <a href="http://twitter.com/RadicatiGroup" class="twitter-user" target="_blank">@RadicatiGroup</a> <a href="http://twitter.com/jorgedlcruz" class="twitter-user" target="_blank">@jorgedlcruz</a> <a href="http://twitter.com/PostlightStud" class="twitter-user" target="_blank">@PostlightStud</a></span> <span class='entry-meta'><span class='time-meta'><a href="http://twitter.com/Zimbra/statuses/845965768319750144" target="_blank">12:48:51 PM March 26, 2017</a></span> <span class='from-meta'>from <a href="http://twitter.com" rel="nofollow">Twitter Web Client</a></span></span> <span class="intent-meta"><a href="http://twitter.com/intent/tweet?in_reply_to=845965768319750144" data-lang="en" class="in-reply-to" title="Reply" target="_blank">Reply</a><a href="http://twitter.com/intent/retweet?tweet_id=845965768319750144" data-lang="en" class="retweet" title="Retweet" target="_blank">Retweet</a><a href="http://twitter.com/intent/favorite?tweet_id=845965768319750144" data-lang="en" class="favorite" title="Favorite" target="_blank">Favorite</a></span></li></ul></div></div><div id="text-15" class="widget widget_text">			<div class="textwidget"><a href="https://www.zimbra.com/try/secure-collaboration-software-free-trial"><img src="https://d2ijs800i4ozhu.cloudfront.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/blog-zimbra-ad-collaboration-trial.jpg" alt="Zimbra Collaboration Trial"/></a></div>
		</div></aside><!-- /#sidebar -->

	<div class="container">
	    <div class="text-block-content col-sm-10 col-sm-offset-1 col-xs-12">
	    	<h1>The Trusted Partner</h1>	        <p>Reaching 120 million monthly visitors, 120 service providers, 3500 enterprises, 500 million email boxes and more than 1000 web publishers, Synacor (NASDAQ:SYNC) is the trusted technology development, multiplatform services and revenue partner for video, internet and communications providers, device manufacturers, and enterprises. We deliver modern, multiscreen experiences and advertising to their consumers that require scale, actionable data and sophisticated implementation. <strong>Synacor enables our customers to better engage with their consumers.</strong></p>
	        	        	    </div>
	</div>
</section><section id="module_3" class="button-full-width">
    <div class="container">
    	    				<div class="col-sm-12 index-1 home-careers-button">
				<a class="btn btn-block" href="/careers/">Careers At Synacor</a>
            </div>
            </div>
</section>

												<li><a href="http://www.zimbra.com/desktop7/help/en_US/Zdesktop/z-Setting_up_POP_IMAP_accounts.htm" target="_blank">POP/IMAP account setup</a></li>

												<li><a href="http://www.zimbra.com/desktop7/help/en_US/Zdesktop/Archiving_your_email_messages.htm" target="_blank">Archiving Messages</a></li>
												<li><a href="http://wiki.zimbra.com/wiki/Zimbra_Desktop_7.1_FAQ" target="_blank">FAQs</a></li>
											</ul> -->
											<h3 class="small">Additional Product Information</h3>
											<ul class="plain">
											<li><a href="http://community.zimbra.com/collaboration/" target="_blank">Zimbra Collaboration</a></li> 
											<li><a href="https://www.zimbra.com/documentation/zimbra-web-client" target="_blank">Zimbra Web Client</a></li> 
											<li><a href="http://community.zimbra.com/collaboration/f/1891" target="_blank">Zimbra Connector for Outlook*</a></li> 
											<li><a href="http://community.zimbra.com/support/f" target="_blank">Zimbra Social</a></li>  
											<li><a href="http://community.zimbra.com/desktop" target="_blank">Zimbra Desktop</a></li> 
											</ul>
										</div>
									</div>
									
									<div class="span-6">
										<div class="pad">
											<h3 class="small">Other Resources</h3>
											<ul class="plain">
											<li><a href="https://wiki.zimbra.com/wiki/Main_Page" target="_blank">Zimbra Wiki</a></li> 
											<li><a href="http://community.zimbra.com/" target="_blank">Zimbra Forums and Community</a></li> 
											<li><a href="http://blog.zimbra.com/" target="_blank">Zimbra Blog</a></li> 
											<li><a href="http://www.zimbra.com/support/training" target="_blank">Zimbra Training</a></li> 
											<li><a href="http://support.zimbra.com/" target="_blank">Zimbra Support</a></li> 
											<li><a href="http://www.zimbra.com/partners" target="_blank">Zimbra Partners</a></li> 
											</ul>
										</div>
									</div>
									
								</div>
								 <div class="span-18 last">
									<p class="pad small">* Network Edition </p>
								</div>
							</div>
							<div class="span-6 last">
